channel.title: A site I made to trick
channel.description:
Anyone thats not to smart with computers will probally fall for this. If you have a younger brother then just open this page, f11 and it will look like your windows xp desktop (if thats what your using) he will figure it out once he goes to all programs
anyways I made this myself all css
[url=http://ssls.byethost2.com/XP/]ssls.byethost2.com/XP/[/url]
Also, I had a larger background image so it didn't repeat but my free host sucks and it takes 20 minutes to upload a 5mb file so I can do that, then I uploaded to pic hosting and it scaled my image to 1600X1200 but it should look alright on most of your monitors unless you have 20+ inch screen.

item.title: A site I made to trick
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“runescape3dude, post:12, topic:246659”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=323137.msg2552370#msg2552370 date=1227668198]

My site is better. It is made to look like vista. + it actually works.

And lol, the Links 2003 background.

Your site is ubershit, you can even get a fucking menu to show up without linking to another page which has a menu…gay![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2008, 09:00:21 pm[/size][hr]Ans what the fuck is the links 2003 background?
[/quote]

No, I just cba to do some java script which makes you CLICK the startbutton to open the menu.

Links 2003 is a golf game. A good one.[/quote]

Yeah, I hate javascript, and the background is Pebble Beach Golf Course and the water is the Pacific Ocean, its a big one.

DeviantArt

Golfer's Dream

7th hole at Pebble Beach Golf Course. Can be wickedly difficult when the wind blows off the Pacific Ocean.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:9, topic:246659”][quote author=runescape3dude link=topic=323137.msg2552362#msg2552362 date=1227667928]
My site is better. It is made to look like vista. + it actually works.

And lol, the Links 2003 background.
[/quote]

Your site is ubershit, you can even get a fucking menu to show up without linking to another page which has a menu…gay![br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 25, 2008, 09:00:21 pm[/size][hr]Ans what the fuck is the links 2003 background?[/quote]

No, I just cba to do some java script which makes you CLICK the startbutton to open the menu.

Links 2003 is a golf game. A good one.

item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Unhandled:

Problem: your images are hosted on tinypic, which means it’s slow as fuck. Get a real webhost?

Yeah I think I explained that but you probably didn’t read the whole post, and only the background is hosted on tinypic, but you probably didn’t look at the code.

Read full topic

item.title: A site I made to trick
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:246659”][quote author=mwiebelhaus link=topic=323137.msg2552330#msg2552330 date=1227666790]

Thats very cool, you should make a very weird OS looking thing and use it when friends come over

Lol thanks, im going to make it so it shows a virus message when you go to all programs probably.
[/quote]
Send messages like ‘Keyloggers have been detected, click here to find you what that may mean’

And tell them about how there passwords and credit cards all have been stolen :D[/quote]

lol maybe, I don’t know how far I can go with css.

All i know is html and css

Read full topic
